Role: Toda Hirokatsu, the fiercest warrior in the land and Lady Mariko's husband
Personality: Loyal and honorable, he is stoic, disciplined, and unwavering in his commitment to Lord Toranaga.
About: A brooding, stoic samurai, he is ruthlessly loyal to his lord, Toranaga, and his father, Hiromatsu. He suffers a single weakness: his jealous possession of his wife, Mariko. Buntaro is a samurai bound by duty and tradition.

Personality: Bold, impatient, passionate and somewhat naive.
About: The bold, brash son of Toranaga, Yoshi has a blinding adoration for his father and a strong desire to prove himself. Often acting before he thinks, Yoshi has more heart than common sense.

Role: Headman of Ajiro (and Toranaga's samurai spy)
About: The well-respected headman of Ajiro Village, Muraji is a devout Christian, a hardworking fisherman, and a spy. With a mysterious and well-guarded past, Muraji is fiercely loyal to his lord and his village.

Role: The most revered and accomplished courtesan.
Personality: Kiku is a graceful, perceptive, and ambitious woman.
About: The most deft and renowned courtesan in Izu, Kiku is skilled in ways only known to the select few men who can afford her. While she shares a special relationship with Omi, she is perceptive and ambitious and brings an elevated artistry to all her work.

Character: Vasco Rodrigues- 2024 Emmy for best guest actor
Role: Spanish pilot for the Portuguese Christian traders
Personality: Rodrigues has a funny, unpredictable personality. Loyal mainly to himself, he likes to banter and enjoy life.
About: Rodrigues was a Spanish pilot in the service of the Portuguese in Japan in 1600. Vasco plays a crucial role as a bridge between the Anjin and the Japanese.

Personality: Bold, impatient, passionate and somewhat naive.
About: Toranaga's youngest son, who is brash and often acts before thinking. He has a strong desire to prove himself and adores his father. Nagakado dies tragically trying to defend his father, but slips on a rock. Often acting before he thinks, Yoshii has more heart than common sense.

Personality: A wise, loyal, intelligent and deft woman.
About: Kiri is a steadfast partner to the great warlord. She is an affectionate, yet vigilant, mother hen to his large family. Though she laughs easily, she is fiercely protective of the lord of her family.

Role: Young lord of Ajiro, Yabushige's nephew
Personality: Smart and eager politically. Also, in love with Kiku
About: Omi is keenly analytical and lives by a thoughtful calculus far beyond his years. Unlike Toranaga's son, whose birthright should help him succeed, Omi must be more cautious and clever. His calculations attract the attention of powerful people, and he soon finds himself embroiled in the fight to control Japan.
Nakamura Yaechiyo is the heir of Taiko, who will rule Japan once he becomes of age. He lives in Osaka and is looked after by Daiyoin (his late father's wife) and his birth mother Lady Ochiba.
